definition: Purple Mountain in suburbs of Nanjing, with Ming tombs and Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum
purple/violet
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Purple Mountain Observatory
pinyin: Zi3 jin1 shan1 Tian1 wen2 tai2

sentences.english: There's an observatory on Mt. Zijin.
sentences.chinese: 這南京紫金山上就有一座天文臺。

sentences.english: The mountain you see to the right is the Purple Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 山上看到你的權利是紫金山。

sentences.english: Seen from the pagoda, the south foot of the Purple Mountain is a sea of trees.
sentences.chinese: 從這個塔上遠眺，紫金山南麓是樹的海洋。

sentences.english: It's difficult for me to climb PurpleMountain, but he climbs it every day.
sentences.chinese: 很難，我爬上紫金山，但他爬它的每一天。

sentences.english: This paper describes an integrating photometer built at Purple Mountain Observatory recently.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹紫金山天文臺直流積分型光度計。

sentences.english: Zijinshan deposit is a large scale copper-gold deposit that was discovered in coastal area of SE china.
sentences.chinese: 紫金山礦牀是我國東南沿海發現的大型金銅礦牀。

sentences.english: Great Wall of Nanking and Purple Mountain, China.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的南京城牆與紫金山。

sentences.english: Our university lies at the foot of Mount Zijin, in the eastern suburbs of Nanjing City.
sentences.chinese: 我們大學位於南京市東郊的裝載紫金山腳下。

sentences.english: Away from this, but also on Purple Mountain are a great many other attractions, as follows.
sentences.chinese: 除了中山陵之外，紫金山上還有許多著名的旅遊景點。

sentences.english: Then we went to Purple Mountain Observatory. (See pictures, including introduction).
sentences.chinese: 接着，我們去了紫金山天文臺。

sentences.english: West of this production in Anhui Province Huainan Bagongshan, known as purple mountain.
sentences.chinese: 今產在安徽省淮南市西部八公山，古稱紫金山。

sentences.english: Zijingshan Copper Mine is one of the large mines newly located in China.
sentences.chinese: 紫金山銅礦是我國近期探明的大型銅礦之一。

definition: Yuhuatai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
Dr Sun Yat-sen's mausoleum in Nanjing
Linggu temple (Nanjing)
Ming tombs in Nanjing, tomb of founding Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1], a World Heritage site
Pukou district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
emergency exit
Nanjing subprovincial city on the Changjiang, capital of Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/capital of China at different historical periods
pre-Han name for Nanjing/common place name
Fangshan county in Lüliang 呂梁|吕梁[Lu:3 liang2], Shanxi 山西
Jiangning district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
Mt Yuelu in Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1], famous for scenery, temples and tombs
Lishui county in Nanjing 南京, Jiangsu
Qinhuai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
Zhenjiang prefecture level city in Jiangsu
Zhongshan district of Liupanshui city 六盤水市|六盘水市[Liu4 pan2 shui3 shi4], Guizhou/Zhongshan county in Hezhou 賀州|贺州[He4 zhou1], Guangxi
